alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 29 at 2:14PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Elko County through 300 PM PDT... At 214 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles east of Jackpot to 24 miles south of Contact. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Brief heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Montello and Hd Summit. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Elko County; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County
